includedAssets.title: Percy Jackson & The Lightning Thief
includedAssets.synopsis: Thundering minotaurs - it's the first adventure for the divinely gifted hero of Rick Riordan's fantasy book series! Logan Lerman plays the New York high-schooler who discovers that not only is he the son of Greek god Poseidon, but that he's been accused of stealing a lightning bolt belonging to Zeus himself. Pierce Brosnan, Uma Thurman, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan are just some of the mythical beings who appear to Percy in his quest to find the bolt and prevent a war of Olympian proportions. Harry Potter director Chris Columbus oversees the mythological malarkey.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Discovering he's the son of Poseidon, school kid Percy Jackson ventures into the underworld to save his mum from Hades.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Thundering minotaurs - it's the first adventure for the divinely gifted hero of Rick Riordan's fantasy book series! Pierce Brosnan, Uma Thurman, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan are just some of the mythical beings who appear to Percy in his quest to find the bolt and prevent a war of Olympian proportions. Harry Potter director Chris Columbus oversees the mythological malarkey.

includedAssets.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
includedAssets.synopsis: The son of Poseidon returns for this second instalment in the fantasy franchise, this time using his demigod skills to find the mythical Golden Fleece. With their sanctuary Camp Half-Blood under threat from evil forces, Percy and his fantastical friends must overcome zombie cab drivers, vengeful former allies and toothsome ocean dwellers. Logan Lerman is back in the lead with some great adult support from Nathan Fillion and Stanley Tucci in a breezy and old-fashioned family adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Percy Jackson embarks on a voyage to capture the Golden Fleece and save the world in this fantasy adventure starring Logan Lerman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The son of Poseidon returns for this second instalment in the fantasy franchise, this time using his demigod skills to find the mythical Golden Fleece. With their sanctuary Camp Half-Blood under threat from evil forces, Percy and his fantastical friends must overcome zombie cab drivers, vengeful former allies and toothsome ocean dwellers. Logan Lerman is back in the lead with some great adult support from Nathan Fillion and Stanley Tucci in a breezy and old-fashioned family adventure.

includedAssets.title: Percy Jackson Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: After a teenage boy (Logan Lerman) discovers Poseidon is his father, he uses his unique abilities to battle his way through the underworld in order to rescue his mother. Later, he must find the Golden Fleece to prevent the end of the world. Smash-hit fantasy based on the series of novels by Rick Riordan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A teenage boy (Logan Lerman) must use his unique powers as the son of Poseidon to save his mother from the underworld, then find the Golden Fleece.
